text: <!here|@here> I solved the riddle of forwarding ssl with HubSpot. You must have a separate web server that has an htaccess or equivalent that you point the root domain toward that. Once you add an SSL to this webserver you will then gain the ability to forward the root domain to HubSpot with and without an SSL.
I suggest that HubSpot creates a way to forward ssl requests like they do with non ssl request. It would be a huge value to its clients.
